mapper.insert:
insert into commodity_product_unit( id, product_unit_serial_number, product_unit_id, sku_id, standard_unit_id, name, sale_price, status, is_vendible, platform_id, demo_sale_price, competing_sale_price, jd_spu_id )values
(#{po.id}, #{po.productUnitSerialNumber}, #{po.productUnitId}, #{po.skuId}, #{po.standardUnitId}, #{po.name}, #{po.salePrice}, #{po.status}, #{po.isVendible}, #{po.platformId}, #{po.demoSalePrice}, #{po.competingSalePrice}, #{po.jdSpuId} )

insert into commodity_product_unit( id, name, sale_price, demo_sale_price, competing_sale_price )values
(#{po.id}, #{po.name}, #{po.salePrice}, #{po.demoSalePrice}, #{po.competingSalePrice} )
on duplicate key update name=VALUES (name), sale_price=VALUES (sale_price), demo_sale_price=VALUES (demo_sale_price), competing_sale_price=VALUES (competing_sale_price)

INSERT INTO commodity_product_unit(
product_unit_serial_number,
product_unit_id,
sku_id,
standard_unit_id,
name,
remark,
sale_price,
status,
is_vendible,
code,
pu_pic_url,
create_time,
update_time,
platform_id,
demo_sale_price,
competing_sale_price,
limit_buy_num,
) VALUES (
#{productUnitSerialNumber},
#{productUnitId},
#{skuId},
#{standardUnitId},
#{name},
#{remark},
#{salePrice},
#{status},
#{isVendible},
#{code},
#{puPicUrl},
#{createTime},
#{updateTime},
#{platformId},
#{demoSalePrice},
#{competingSalePrice},
#{limitBuyNum},
)
select LAST_INSERT_ID()

INSERT INTO commodity_product_unit( product_unit_serial_number, product_unit_id, sku_id, standard_unit_id, name, remark, sale_price, status, is_vendible, code, pu_pic_url, platform_id, demo_sale_price, competing_sale_price ) VALUES
mapper.update:
UPDATE commodity_product_unit
product_unit_serial_number = #{productUnitSerialNumber},
product_unit_id = #{productUnitId},
sku_id = #{skuId},
standard_unit_id = #{standardUnitId},
name = #{name},
remark = #{remark},
sale_price = #{salePrice},
status = #{status},
is_vendible = #{isVendible},
code = #{code},
pu_pic_url = #{puPicUrl},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
demo_sale_price=#{demoSalePrice},
competing_sale_price=#{competingSalePrice},
limit_buy_num=#{limitBuyNum},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE commodity_product_unit
product_unit_serial_number = #{productUnitSerialNumber},
sku_id = #{skuId},
standard_unit_id = #{standardUnitId},
name = #{name},
remark = #{remark},
sale_price = #{salePrice},
status = #{status},
is_vendible = #{isVendible},
code = #{code},
pu_pic_url = #{puPicUrl},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
demo_sale_price=#{demoSalePrice},
competing_sale_price=#{competingSalePrice},
WHERE product_unit_id = #{productUnitId}
UPDATE commodity_product_unit cpu,sku s set cpu.status = #{status} WHERE cpu.sku_id = s.id and s.is_available = 1 and cpu.standard_unit_id = #{standardUnitId}
UPDATE commodity_product_unit set is_vendible = 0 WHERE sku_id = #{skuId}

insert into commodity_product_unit( id, sale_price, demo_sale_price, competing_sale_price )values
(#{po.id}, #{po.salePrice}, #{po.demoSalePrice}, #{po.competingSalePrice} )
on duplicate key update sale_price=VALUES (sale_price), demo_sale_price=VALUES (demo_sale_price), competing_sale_price=VALUES (competing_sale_price)
